title: Alibaba : number of employees 2018 , by department
summary: This chart shows the Alibaba in millions of employees that was number on employees 2018 in different continents in 2018 .
\n\\n Research_and_development number the most Alibaba on employees 2018 in Alibaba with around 24964 % employees being number .
General_and_administrative then number the next highest amount with 6494 % employees and Sales_and_marketing number half in at 10143 % .
gold: The statistic shows the number of full-time employees of the Alibaba Group , sorted by department . As of March 2018 , the Chinese e-commerce corporation had 24,964 full-time employees working in operations and customer service .
